panels.description: Latest block height on the XDC Network. Increases as new blocks are added to the blockchain.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "block_height" and r.chainId == "50")
  |> group(columns: ["chainId"])
  |> max(column: "_value")
  |> yield(name: "max")

panels.title: Current Block Height

panels.description: Block height comparison across RPC endpoints. Discrepancies indicate potential synchronization issues.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "block_height" and r.chainId == "50")
  |> last(column: "_value")
  |> group(columns: ["endpoint"])

panels.title: Block Height Comparison

panels.description: Current status of HTTPS RPC endpoints. Green = operational, red = down or error.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "rpc_status" and r.chainId == "50")
  |> last(column: "_value")
  |> group(columns: ["endpoint"])

panels.title: HTTPS RPC Status

panels.description: Current status of WebSocket endpoints. Green = connected, red = disconnected.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "websocket_status" and r.chainId == "50")
  |> last(column: "_value")
  |> group(columns: ["endpoint"])

panels.title: WebSocket Status

panels.description: Time between the last two blocks. Lower values (2-3s) indicate healthy network operation.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "block_time" and r.chainId == "50")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "block_time_simple" and r.chainId == "50")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "seconds")
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

panels.title: Block Time

panels.description: Mean response time (ms) for each RPC endpoint over time.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "rpc_latency" and r.chainId == "50")
  |> group(columns: ["endpoint"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

panels.title: Average RPC Latency by Endpoint

panels.description: RPC endpoint availability timeline. Green = up, red = down. Helps identify recurring issues.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "rpc_status" and r.chainId == "50")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "endpoint"])
  |> group(columns: ["endpoint"])

panels.title: RPC Endpoint Status History

panels.description: WebSocket connectivity timeline. Green = connected, red = disconnected.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "websocket_status" and r.chainId == "50")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "endpoint"])
  |> group(columns: ["endpoint"])

panels.title: WS Endpoint Status History

panels.description: Recent blocks with their total, successful, and failed transaction counts.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "transactions_per_block" and r.chainId == "50")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "block_number", "status"])
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["block_number"], columnKey: ["status"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> sort(columns: ["block_number"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 20)

panels.title: Recent Transactions Per Block

panels.description: Visual breakdown of transaction success and failure rates by block number.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "transactions_per_block" and r.status == "success" and r.chainId == "50")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "block_number", "status"])
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["block_number"], columnKey: ["status"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> sort(columns: ["block_number"], desc: true)

from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "transactions_per_block" and r.status == "failed" and r.chainId == "50")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "block_number", "status"])
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["block_number"], columnKey: ["status"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> sort(columns: ["block_number"], desc: true)

panels.title: Transaction Count by Block Number

panels.description: New blocks created per minute. Normal rate is ~30 blocks/minute.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "block_height" and r.chainId == "50")
  |> group(columns: ["endpoint"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> derivative(unit: 1m, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

panels.title: Block Height Growth Rate

panels.description: Successful vs failed transactions per 5-minute window.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "transactions_per_block" and r.chainId == "50" and (r.status == "confirmed" or r.status == "success"))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "transactions_per_block" and r.chainId == "50" and r.status == "failed")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)

panels.title: Transaction Volume (5-minute windows)

panels.description: Historical trend of block times. Shows network performance over time.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "block_time" and r.chainId == "50")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

panels.title: Block Time Trend

panels.description: 95th percentile of RPC response times. Shows near worst-case performance for each endpoint.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "rpc_latency" and r.chainId == "50")
  |> group(columns: ["endpoint"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: (column, tables=<-) => tables |> quantile(q: 0.95, column: column), createEmpty: false)

panels.title: RPC Response Times (95th Percentile)

panels.description: Success/failure history of XDC native token transfer transactions (normal transactions only) across different RPC endpoints

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "transaction_monitor" and r.chainId == "50")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "success" and r.type == "normal_transaction")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.rpc =~ /^https?:\/\// or r.rpc == "http://173.212.233.170:8989")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if r._value then 1 else 0 }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "rpc"])
  |> group(columns: ["rpc"])

panels.title: XDC Transfer Transaction History

panels.description: Transaction confirmation times in milliseconds

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "transaction_monitor_confirmation_time" and r.type == "normal_transaction" and r.chainId == "50")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.rpc =~ /^https?:\/\// or r.rpc == "ttp://173.212.233.170:8989")
  |> group(columns: ["type", "rpc"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

panels.title: Normal Transfer - Confirmation Time

panels.description: Success/failure history of contract deployment transactions across different RPC endpoints

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "transaction_monitor" and r.chainId == "50")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "success" and r.type == "contract_deployment")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.rpc =~ /^https?:\/\// or r.rpc == "http://173.212.233.170:8989")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if r._value then 1 else 0 }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "rpc"])
  |> group(columns: ["rpc"])

panels.title: Contract Deployment Transaction History

panels.description: Transaction confirmation times in milliseconds

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "transaction_monitor_confirmation_time" and r.type == "contract_deployment" and r.chainId == "50")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.rpc =~ /^https?:\/\// or r.rpc == "http://173.212.233.170:8989")
  |> group(columns: ["type", "rpc"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

panels.title: Contract Deployment - Confirmation Time

panels.description: Wallet balances for transaction monitoring. Sufficient balance is required for automated transaction tests to run.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "transaction_wallet_balance" and r.chainId == "50")
  |> group(columns: ["network"])
  |> last()

panels.title: Wallet Balances

panels.description: Current epoch information for the XDC Network

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "validator_summary" and r.chainId == "50")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

panels.title: Current Epoch

panels.description: Active masternode count for the current epoch

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "validator_summary" and r.chainId == "50")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

panels.title: Active Masternodes

panels.description: Standby node count for the current epoch

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "validator_summary" and r.chainId == "50")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

panels.title: Standby Nodes

panels.description: Penalty node count for the current epoch

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "validator_summary" and r.chainId == "50")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

panels.title: Penalty Nodes

panels.description: Distribution of validator nodes across different statuses

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "validator_summary" and r.chainId == "50")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ 
    _time: r._time,
    "Masternodes": r.masternode_count,
    "Standby Nodes": r.standbynode_count,
    "Penalty Nodes": r.penalty_count
  }))
  |> yield(name: "node_distribution")

panels.title: Validator Node Distribution

panels.description: Number of penalty nodes over time

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "validator_summary" and r.chainId == "50" and r._field == "penalty_count")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

panels.title: Penalty List Size Over Time

panels.description: Top miners by most missed blocks

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "consensus_miner_performance" and r.chainId == "50")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> group(columns: ["miner"])
  |> last()
  |> sort(columns: ["missed_blocks"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 20)

panels.title: Miner Performance (Top 20 by Missed Blocks)

panels.description: Timeout periods detected on the network

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "consensus_timeout_periods" and r.chainId == "50")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

panels.title: Timeout Period Analysis

panels.description: Recent missed rounds with expected and actual miner

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "consensus_missed_rounds" and r.chainId == "50")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 50)

panels.title: Recent Missed Rounds

panels.description: Recent alert history showing system health issues, components affected, and timing.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "alert_history" and r.chainId == "50")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)

panels.title: Recent Alert History
